citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:18 p.m. on
14-FEB-17.
The Inspectors arrived at the facility, called the telephone number provided by the licensee and left a voice
message. Inspectors waited at the facility for thirty minutes and left an official business card at the gate before
leaving the premises.
Additional Inspectors
Andricos Alexandra, Veterinary Medical Officer
